title: How To Break Up With Your Friends & Identify Life's Most Meaningful Relationships With Erin Falconer
itunes:title: How To Break Up With Your Friends & Identify Life's Most Meaningful Relationships With Erin Falconer
description:
#448: On today's episode we are joined by Erin Falconer. Erin is a Canadian living in Los Angeles. She has had a varied career that includes screenplay writer, stand-up comedian, political consultant and is now proudly, heavily invested in the online blogging world. Today she joins the show to discuss her book, "How To Break Up With Your Friends".
